channel.title: About me on Pavithra
channel.description: Recent content in About me on Pavithra

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! My name is Pavithra Eswaramoorthy1. 👋 I’m a Developer Relations professional and an Open Source Sustainer, with over five years of experience working with OSS communities and a background in Computer Science and Engineering.

item.title: Short conference bio
item.description: Pavithra Eswaramoorthy is a Developer Advocate at Quansight, where she works to improve the developer experience and community engagement for several open source projects in the PyData community.
